@graph.name: Simon Vitecek
@graph.jobTitle: University Assistant = PostDoc with enhanced responsibilities
@graph.description:
I currently work at the Wasser Cluster Lunz, Lunz am See, Austria as PostDoc with a somewhat enlarged field of responsibilities that might be considered those of a group leader.
Focus of my work is mostly on Limnology, and systematics, taxonomy and evolution of Trichoptera and Plecoptera. My background includes neurobiology, as I was working on behaviour and neurobiology of a moth model organism during my Master's
I am currently involved in the COST Action CA15219 "Developing new genetic tools for bioassessment of aquatic ecosystems in Europe", and pursue studies on the evolution and biodiversity of European, African, Pacific and Asian caddisflies.
